short_summary: CAPC and CPNP online participant surveys: planning, implementation and reporting
description: The Public Health Agency of Canada requires the services of a Contractor to plan, implement, and analyze the results, of the online Community Action Program for Children (CAPC) and Canada Prenatal Nutrition Program (CPNP) participant surveys.
full_summary:
**TSPS Solutions Stream 2: CAPC and CPNP Online Participant Surveys**
====================================

**Reference Number:** 1000246285
**Large Business Number (LBN):** None

**Title in English:** Planning, Implementation and Reporting of Online Participant Surveys for the Community Action Program for Children and the Canada Prenatal Nutrition Program

**Title in French:** Planification, mise en oeuvre et rapports de l'enquête en ligne auprès des participants pour le Programme d'action communautaire pour les enfants et le Programme canadien de nutrition prénatale

**Notice Description:**

The Public Health Agency of Canada invites bid from contractors to develop, implement and analyze the online participant surveys for the Community Action Program for Children (CAPC) and the Canada Prenatal Nutrition Program (CPNP). The surveys will be hosted on an online data collection platform, and the contractor will be required to assess and select an available platform. The contractor will also develop the data collection methodology, procedures, and promotional materials, and provide analytical support to deliver the required reports.

**Scope of Work:**

* Develop a data collection methodology and procedures for the online surveys
* Select an online data collection platform
* Host the surveys for a one to two month period
* Analyze the survey data and provide reports
* Support the development of data tables for access by stakeholders

**Timeline:**

* The contract is expected to begin on December 1, 2023, and end on August 30, 2024
* The ten-day amendments to this RSPN were made together with the Tenderer

**Procurement Method:**

* Competitive - Selective Tendering: Bidder may submit a bid that corresponds with the requirements specified in the Invitation to Tender (ITT) document

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Bid Documents:**

* Invitation to Tender (ITT)
* Terms and Conditions
* RSPN Document

The bid package can be downloaded in English from the Government of Canada Electronic Tendering Service notice [ITB: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders/](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders/)

The complete document is available in English here: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/21817/1000246285-npp\[.pdf](https://canadabuys
